term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - linearity of responsivity (of a radiation detector)
term.title: linearity of responsivity

item.text: The extent to which the output of the detector is directly proportional to the incident radiant power at a given wavelength and at constant irradiation geometry.

sources.item: PAC, 1995, 67, 1745. 'Nomenclature, symbols, units and their usage in spectrochemical analysis-XI. Detection of radiation (IUPAC Recommendations 1995)' on page 1750 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199567101745)
